page.title: 04CHRISTIAN MALFORD SCHOOL
page.content: OUR SCHOOL IS CALLED CHRISTIAN MALFORD PRIMARY SCHOOL.TERE ARE 78 CHILDREN HERE.THE INFANTS ARE 5 AND 6 YEARS OLD.IN JUNIOR 2 THEY ARE 6,7,AND 8YEARS OLD AND IN JUNIOR 1 THE CHILDREN ARE FROM 8 TO 11 YEARS OLD.WE HAVE 3 TEACHERS,MRS.NICHOLAS,MR.BUCHANAN,AND MRS.MAXWELL.MRS.PALMER COMES AND TEACHES US 1DAY A WEEK.MRS.BOULTER IS THE CARETAKER AND SHE CLEANS UP THE SCHOOL EVERY NIGHT.MRS.HAYWARD AND MRS.WHEELER COOK THE SCHOOL DINNERS BUT ABOUT 42 CHILDREN BRING SANDWICHES.MRS.CROTTY AND MRS.BAKER LOOK AFTER US AT DINNER TIME
